artist: Artist: Andy Baird; Artist: Mike Brehm; Artist: Robert Corbit; Artist: Mike DeVoni; Artist: Frank Gaard; Artist: Joe Hoppe; Artist: Chris Karcher; Artist: Mike McCoy; Artist: Denise Monaghan; Artist: Ann Morgan; Artist: Jennifer Sobin; Artist: Tim Walton; Artist: Jon West; Artist: Chris Woodward; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 8 pages, saddle-stapled; b&w covers; black and white publication with "Artpolice" in large letters across top; subtext says "near meltdown at nuclear plant; radioactive gas is released"; image of man at LL holding a small child with a nuclear plant in right and middle foreground
title: Artpolice, Vol. 16, No.1: "Three Mile Island Tenth Anniversary Issue"
